value:
$WmMEID_エイトリ,ch00_35_Eitri_F_Normal,Face_Anger|...It's starting to get rather noisy
out there. If we don't hurry, they
might actually make it through.$k$p$WmMEID_オッテル,ch00_31_Otr_M_Normal,Face_Cool|Be quiet and hurry up! Can you make
Járngreipr or can't you?$k$p$WmMEID_エイトリ,ch00_35_Eitri_F_Normal,Face|Ah, Summoner, it must be wonderful
for you, the one solitary person to be
chosen by the divine weapon...$k$pIf I had power like that, ohh...
I could create a weapon so fine
it would rival Thórr's Mjölnir!$k$p$EFace_Smile2|...Everything is prepared. There's but
one necessity remaining: your soul.
Come now, Summoner...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Stop right there!$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Anger|We made it! Sorry about keeping you
waiting, $Nu!$k$p$EFace_Smile|It looks like you've got your head
and all your limbs though—so that's
good to see!$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face_Anger|I can't believe you used us, Eitri!
I'll never forgive you!$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Cool|The Order of Heroes leaves
no one behind!$k$p$WmMEID_ダグ,ch00_34_Dagr_F_Normal,Face_Pain|...I know we're all focused on the
summoner, but we're here to get
Gramr back too, right?$k$p$WmMEID_ノート,ch00_33_Nott_F_Normal,Face_Cool|Excellent point, Dagr. I'll leave
the weak and sick-looking ones
for you.$k$p$WmMEID_オッテル,ch00_31_Otr_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Gah! You fools!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Let's go! It's time to get you out
of here, $Nu!$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_闇マーク女,ch04_24_Marc_F_Dark04,Face|Up until now, my faith was
unshakable. I was ready to kill
my own friends...$k$p$Sbs1000|
